sqlQuery.name: OrfMotifFiles
sqlQuery.sql: WITH orgs AS ( SELECT DISTINCT organism, project_id FROM apidbtuning.GenomicSeqAttributes UNION -- GiardiaDB uses species for everything SELECT DISTINCT species, project_id FROM apidbtuning.TranscriptAttributes WHERE project_id = 'GiardiaDB' UNION -- Mitochondrial GENES and GENOME SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(organism, ' mitochondrial'), project_id FROM apidbtuning.GenomicSeqAttributes WHERE so_id = 'SO:0000819' UNION -- Plastid GENES and GENOME SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(organism , ' plastid' ) as organism, project_id FROM apidbtuning.GenomicSeqAttributes WHERE so_id = 'SO:0001259' ) SELECT DISTINCT coalesce(ot.term, files.term) AS term , CASE WHEN ot.organism IS NULL THEN files.parentterm ELSE ot.parentterm END AS parentterm , CASE WHEN (ot.organism IS NULL OR (ot.organism IS NOT NULL AND ot.term = files.term)) THEN CONCAT('@WEBSERVICEMIRROR@', '/', ot.project_id, '/build-%%buildNumber%%/', files.abbreviation, '/motif/ORFs_AA.fasta') ELSE '-1' END AS internal FROM apidbtuning.organismtree ot RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT abbrev.organism AS term , abbrev.parent AS parentTerm , abbrev.abbreviation FROM orgs, apidbtuning.OrganismAbbreviationws abbrev WHERE orgs.organism = abbrev.organism AND (orgs.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR 'EuPathDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR 'UniDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@') ) files ON files.term = ot.organism ORDER BY parentterm, term

sqlQuery.name: GenomicMotifFiles
sqlQuery.sql: WITH orgs AS ( SELECT DISTINCT organism, project_id FROM apidbtuning.GenomicSeqAttributes UNION SELECT DISTINCT species, project_id FROM apidbtuning.TranscriptAttributes WHERE project_id = 'GiardiaDB' UNION -- Mitochondrial GENES and GENOME SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(organism, ' mitochondrial'), project_id FROM apidbtuning.GenomicSeqAttributes WHERE so_id = 'SO:0000819' UNION -- Plastid GENES and GENOME SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(organism , ' plastid' ) as organism, project_id FROM apidbtuning.GenomicSeqAttributes WHERE so_id = 'SO:0001259' ) SELECT DISTINCT coalesce(ot.term, files.term) AS term , CASE WHEN ot.organism IS NULL THEN files.parentterm ELSE ot.parentterm END AS parentterm , CASE WHEN (ot.organism IS NULL OR (ot.organism IS NOT NULL AND ot.term = files.term)) THEN CONCAT('@WEBSERVICEMIRROR@', '/', ot.project_id, '/build-%%buildNumber%%/', files.abbreviation, '/fasta/GenomeDoubleStrand.fasta') ELSE '-1' END AS internal FROM apidbtuning.organismtree ot RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT abbrev.organism AS term , abbrev.parent AS parentTerm , abbrev.abbreviation FROM orgs, apidbtuning.OrganismAbbreviationws abbrev WHERE orgs.organism = abbrev.organism AND abbrev.project_id != 'HostDB' AND (orgs.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR 'EuPathDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR 'UniDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@') ) files ON files.term = ot.organism ORDER BY parentterm, term

sqlQuery.name: AnnotatedProteinMotifFiles
sqlQuery.sql: WITH orgs AS ( SELECT DISTINCT organism, project_id FROM apidbtuning.TranscriptAttributes WHERE ((gene_type = 'protein coding' OR gene_type = 'protein coding gene') AND organism NOT IN ('Toxoplasma gondii RH')) UNION -- TrichDB Repeat Genes SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(organism, ' (Repeated Genes)'), project_id FROM apidbtuning.TranscriptAttributes WHERE project_id = 'TrichDB' UNION -- GiardiaDB uses species for everything SELECT DISTINCT species, project_id FROM apidbtuning.TranscriptAttributes WHERE project_id = 'GiardiaDB' UNION -- Mitochondrial GENES SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(organism, ' mitochondrial'), project_id FROM apidbtuning.GenomicSeqAttributes WHERE so_id = 'SO:0000819' UNION -- Plastid GENES SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(organism , ' plastid' ) as organism, project_id FROM apidbtuning.GenomicSeqAttributes WHERE so_id = 'SO:0001259' ) SELECT DISTINCT coalesce(ot.term, files.term) AS term , CASE WHEN ot.organism IS NULL THEN files.parentterm ELSE ot.parentterm END AS parentterm , CASE WHEN (ot.organism IS NULL OR (ot.organism IS NOT NULL AND ot.term = files.term)) THEN CONCAT('@WEBSERVICEMIRROR@', '/', files.project_id, '/build-%%buildNumber%%/', files.abbreviation, '/fasta/AnnotatedProteins.fasta') ELSE '-1' END AS internal FROM apidbtuning.organismtree ot RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT abbrev.organism AS term , abbrev.parent AS parentTerm , abbrev.abbreviation , orgs.project_id FROM orgs, apidbtuning.OrganismAbbreviationws abbrev WHERE orgs.organism = abbrev.organism AND (orgs.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR ('EuPathDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@' AND NOT abbrev.project_id = 'HostDB') OR ('UniDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@' AND NOT abbrev.project_id = 'HostDB') ) ) files ON files.term = ot.organism ORDER BY parentTerm, Term
